title: Child's Play - Chucky Comics
description:
Here's a collection of comics featuring everyone's favourite serial killer doll.

Beginning in 1990, Innovation Publishing released the first comic books based on the films, in the form of a three issue adaptation of Child's Play 2.  The success of the adaptation led to a monthly series of new stories starting in 1991. The series, titled Child's Play: The Series, ended in 1992 after only five issues. This was followed by a three issue adaptation of Child's Play 3.


In 2007, Devil's Due Publishing obtained the license to publish Child's Play comics and released a one-shot crossover with Hack/Slash titled Hack/Slash vs. Chucky which takes place after the events of the Seed of Chucky film. This was followed by a four-issue series called Chucky, Where he sets his sights on the survivors of his previous killing sprees. A second volume began in early 2009 but ceased publication after only one issue.

Enjoy, seed and if you like it, buy it!
